items.title: Paramount launches rival bid for Warner Bros Discovery
items.description: The Hollywood battle to buy Warner Bros Discovery is shaping up to be a blockbuster.

items.title: 'I am not weak' says Liverpool manager Arne Slot as he responds to Salah outburst
items.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says he is "not weak" and denies the situation with Mohamed Salah has undermined his authority.

items.title: 'I am not weak' says Slot, but Salah could return
items.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says he is "not weak" and denies the situation with Mohamed Salah has undermined his authority.

items.title: Three-year-old girl killed in Gaza by Israeli forces, local sources say
items.description: Israel says it is unaware of a strike, but is investigating the reported death of the child in southern Gaza.

items.title: Why Sandie Peggie ruling could lead to big changes for employers
items.description: A tribunal has ruled that the nurse was harassed by NHS Fife - but dismissed all other claims in her case.
